pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'RStudio' Addins to Prettify 'HTML', 'CSS', 'JavaScript', and More // Provides 'RStudio' addins to prettify 'HTML', 'CSS', 'SCSS', 'JavaScript', 'JSX', 'Markdown', and to format 'C', 'C++', 'Julia', 'Python', 'Shell' and 'SQL'. Two addins are provided: 'Prettify' and 'Indent'. The 'Indent' addin only reindents the code, while the 'Prettify' addin also modifies the code, e.g. it adds trailing semi-colons to 'JavaScript' code when they are missing.
